definition: to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
tired/weary/to strain/to wear out/to work hard
to accumulate/to involve or implicate (Taiwan pr. [lei4])/continuous/repeated

sentences.chinese: 这些劳累的孩子直到7点才回家。

sentences.english: Long hours, inadequate food, and overwork had weakened him.
sentences.chinese: 工作时间长，食物不足，劳累过度累垮了他的身体。

sentences.english: I overdid it at work and damaged my heart.
sentences.chinese: 我劳累过度，损坏了我的心脏。

sentences.english: The strain of the last few days has weakened him considerably .
sentences.chinese: 最近几天的劳累在很大程度上使他身体衰弱了。

sentences.english: One of the biggest reasons for burnout is lack of proper planning.
sentences.chinese: 劳累过度的最大原因之一就是缺乏合适的计划。

sentences.english: Nancy: Jim, how could you let her keep on burning the candle at both ends ?
sentences.chinese: 吉姆，你怎么能让她不断地过分劳累的工作？

sentences.english: I went to the hotel, and tried to sleep a little after my tiring journey.
sentences.chinese: 我来到旅馆，准备睡一会，消消旅途的劳累。

sentences.english: I think his cancer is resulted from the overfull tire.
sentences.chinese: 我认为他是因为过多的劳累而得了癌症。

sentences.english: I'm afraid they'vebeen overworking you again at the office.
sentences.chinese: 怕是他们在事务所又让你劳累过度了吧。

sentences.english: He overworked himself on that new job.
sentences.chinese: 他做那项新工作太劳累了。

sentences.english: As toilsome I wander'd Virginia's woods.
sentences.chinese: 劳累时想起弗吉尼亚森林。

sentences.english: Lying in his warm bed, he forgets his tiredness from his travels.
sentences.chinese: 他躺在温软的床上，忘记了旅途的劳累。

sentences.english: He slackened his pace as he got tired.
sentences.chinese: 当他劳累的时候他放慢了速度。

sentences.english: He was overwrought and may have mistaken witchcraft for healing.
sentences.chinese: 他劳累过度，也许把女巫的伎俩误认为治疗术了。

definition: exhausting/hard/tough/arduous/to work hard/to go to a lot of trouble/hardship(s)
tired/weary/to strain/to wear out/to work hard
to accumulate/to involve or implicate (Taiwan pr. [lei4])/continuous/repeated
to rush about/to be constantly on the move
to tax one's mind and body/demanding (work)/dedicated (worker)/hard-working
